titles.title: FinCEN–SBA Coordination on Beneficial Ownership Registration Act
FinCEN–SBA Coordination on Beneficial Ownership Registration Act

A bill to require the Director of the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network and the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to enter into a memorandum of understanding to ensure the dissemination of covered information, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
